title: Homeschool Planner Setup
description:
Set up the Homeschool Planner app - a weekly planning tool for homeschooling families.

## Overview
Replace paper-based weekly planners with a digital tool that:
- Tracks daily subject completion across the week (7-day grid, flexible school days)
- Supports 'Pick 1' subject categories
- Captures narrations (text, voice, photo) as learning evidence
- Works on mobile and iPad (duet view at ≥768px)

## Tech Stack
- React Router v7 + React 18 + TypeScript
- Prisma + SQLite
- Tailwind CSS
- Magic link auth via Mailgun
- Kamal deployment to existing VPS (103.235.75.227)

## Users
- Parent (admin): sees all students, manages everything
- Students (Najmi 11, Isa 8): own logins, see only their data, mark complete + add narrations

## Child Tasks
- hs-001: Project Setup - Scaffold React Router v7 App
- hs-002: Core Weekly View - Grid & Navigation
- hs-003: Daily Focus View - Task Cards & Progress
- hs-004: Narrations - Text, Voice & Photo Capture
- hs-005: Multi-user & Permissions System
- hs-006: Deployment - Kamal to VPS

## Plan Document
See: ~/.claude/plans/fancy-coalescing-trinket.md
